name: emi.bdii-site
description: The Berkeley Database Information Index (BDII) consists of a standard LDAP database which is updated by an external process.
releaseNotes:
What's new



    This is a minor update to enable OpenLDAP 2.4 for the site BDII.



Installation and configuration



    Upgrading bdii-config-site will install OpenLDAP 2.4. On restarting the BDII, OpenLDAP 2.4 will be used.



Known issues



    None
changeLog: Put the Change logs here (multiline field)
